solution_line_template: Macy used {macy_tokens} tokens which are worth {pitches_per_token} pitches each, so {macy_tokens} tokens x {pitches_per_token} pitches = <<{macy_tokens}*{pitches_per_token}={macy_total_pitches}>>{macy_total_pitches} pitches.
Piper used {piper_tokens} tokens x {pitches_per_token} pitches = <<{piper_tokens}*{pitches_per_token}={piper_total_pitches}>>{piper_total_pitches} pitches.
Together, Macy and Piper received {macy_total_pitches} + {piper_total_pitches} = <<{macy_total_pitches}+{piper_total_pitches}={total_pitches_received}>>{total_pitches_received} pitches.
Macy hit the ball {macy_hits} times + Piper's {piper_hits} hits = <<{macy_hits}+{piper_hits}={total_hits}>>{total_hits} total hits.
Of the {total_pitches_received} pitches - {total_hits} total hits = <<{total_pitches_received}-{total_hits}={total_misses}>>{total_misses} misses.
